create_query: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS Authors; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Authors( Id INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, Name TEXT NOT NULL, CreatedAt DATETIME); DROP TABLE IF EXISTS Messages; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Messages( Id INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, AuthorId INTEGER NOT NULL, CreatedAt DATETIME, Content TEXT NOT NULL);
author_by_name: SELECT Id FROM authors WHERE name =?;
author_by_id: SELECT Name, CreatedAt FROM authors WHERE id =?;
message_by_id: SELECT AuthorId, CreatedAt, Content FROM messages WHERE id =?;
all_messages: SELECT AuthorId, CreatedAt, Content FROM messages ORDER BY CreatedAt DESC;
insert_author: INSERT INTO authors (Name, CreatedAt) VALUES (?, DATETIME('now','utc')) RETURNING Id
insert_message: INSERT INTO messages (AuthorId, CreatedAt, Content) VALUES (?,DATETIME('now','utc'),?) RETURNING Id
